course_title: Interpretation of The New Testament I
course_description:
An introduction to the contents and concepts of the New Testament writings, with
attention to the historical, literary, and theological dimensions of these biblical books.
prerequisites: OT 501 and OT 502 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections:
